task.summary: *Removed embedded css *Removed embedded js *Deleted delete.php *Added search functionality *Changed product factory to product provider
*Implemented session/cookies functionality *Started implementing the use of CSRF tokens for validating requests *Implemented a middleware script *Implemented an error page
* Implemented XSS input filtering * Improved search query functionality * Added error message when item cannot be found
*Minor changes *Added the use of progress bar when submitting ajax request
Added the functionality to check if a product exists in the ProductProvider class
* Finished design of add page * Tidying up code
* Implementing working add and edit form - Just need to actually to make them function next
* Refactored the backend API code. Moved it to a class instead for ease of use and not having to repeat oneself. * On track to implementing AJAX requests for add and edit functions.
* Refined alerts for add and edit AJAX functionalities
* Tidying up of code and major refactor of code
